animeTitle: Pokemon Legends Arceus: Yuki Hodo Kishi Futaai
otherNames: Pokemon: Hisuian Snow, Pokémon LEGENDS アルセウス 雪ほどきし二藍, Twin Indigo of Melting Snow
synopsis: The anime tells the story of a boy named Akio and his encounter with a Hisuian Zorua. When he was younger, Akio's father taught him that people and Pokémon cannot live together. But Akio's interactions with the Zorua might offer a different lesson.
